label: G = 1/288^4 density anchor
reason: Requires Wolfram Alpha API, experimental data, or advanced computation not yet implemented
note: PENDING: G = 1/288^4 density anchor. Validation: Weakest force (distributed over bulk)
pythonCode:
from core.FormulasRegistry import get_registry
reg = get_registry()

# Values from SSoT
roots = reg.roots_total          # 288
chi = reg.chi_eff                # 144

# Gravitational constant from root lattice density
# G ~ 1/288^4 - gravity weakest because distributed over entire bulk
G_scale = 1.0 / (roots ** 4)     # ~1.45e-10 (dimensionless scale)
G_experimental = 6.674e-11       # m^3/(kg*s^2)

# Ratio shows gravity suppression by bulk volume
suppression_factor = roots ** 4  # 6.9e9 - bulk dilution
verified = suppression_factor > 1e9
